row.process: MERGE INTO BBS.TBBVTR_T_STAND BBS USING SPIEGELWORK.TBBVTR_T_STAND TMP ON ( BBS.MANDANT = TMP.MANDANT and BBS.VTR_T_ID = TMP.VTR_T_ID and BBS.WIRKSAM_ZUM = TMP.WIRKSAM_ZUM ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BBS.VTR_NR = TMP.VTR_NR ,BBS.AKTIV_ANSPR = TMP.AKTIV_ANSPR ,BBS.ANW_JN = TMP.ANW_JN ,BBS.BTFR_JN = TMP.BTFR_JN ,BBS.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR = TMP.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR ,BBS.CREATE_DAT = TMP.CREATE_DAT ,BBS.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM = TMP.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM ,BBS.DK_ZUF = TMP.DK_ZUF ,BBS.DR = TMP.DR ,BBS.DR_BON = TMP.DR_BON ,BBS.DR_BTFR = TMP.DR_BTFR ,BBS.DR_RIS_VN = TMP.DR_RIS_VN ,BBS.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND = TMP.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND ,BBS.DR_ZILLM = TMP.DR_ZILLM ,BBS.GAG = TMP.GAG ,BBS.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ = TMP.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ ,BBS.GEW_VW_SKZ = TMP.GEW_VW_SKZ ,BBS.KOLL_ART_SKZ = TMP.KOLL_ART_SKZ ,BBS.KOLL_VTR_NR = TMP.KOLL_VTR_NR ,BBS.LAND_SKZ = TMP.LAND_SKZ ,BBS.LFD_BTR_JN = TMP.LFD_BTR_JN ,BBS.PROD_SKZ = TMP.PROD_SKZ ,BBS.PROD_T_SKZ = TMP.PROD_T_SKZ ,BBS.RED_ZWI_DG = TMP.RED_ZWI_DG ,BBS.RED_ZWI_RFB = TMP.RED_ZWI_RFB ,BBS.STAND_ART_SKZ = TMP.STAND_ART_SKZ ,BBS.STAND_NRF_JN = TMP.STAND_NRF_JN ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR = TMP.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR = TMP.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM = TMP.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM ,BBS.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW = TMP.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW ,BBS.S_AM_KOST = TMP.S_AM_KOST ,BBS.S_AM_KOST_DK = TMP.S_AM_KOST_DK ,BBS.S_ANS_DG = TMP.S_ANS_DG ,BBS.S_ANS_RFB = TMP.S_ANS_RFB ,BBS.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL = TMP.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL ,BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG = TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB = TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_BON_GEW_DG = TMP.S_BON_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_BON_GEW_RFB = TMP.S_BON_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_BRT_BTR = TMP.S_BRT_BTR ,BBS.S_BTR_UEBTR = TMP.S_BTR_UEBTR ,BBS.S_BTR_ZS = TMP.S_BTR_ZS ,BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB = TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB ,BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON = TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON ,BBS.S_E_BTR = TMP.S_E_BTR ,BBS.S_FOND_GEW_DG = TMP.S_FOND_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_FOND_GEW_RFB = TMP.S_FOND_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_RATE_ZS = TMP.S_RATE_ZS ,BBS.S_RED_VERR_FORD = TMP.S_RED_VERR_FORD ,BBS.S_REN_ZS = TMP.S_REN_ZS ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_1 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_1 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_2 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_2 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_3 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_3 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_BON = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_BON ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB = TMP.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB ,BBS.S_SPAR_BTR = TMP.S_SPAR_BTR ,BBS.S_SPAR_BTR_BON = TMP.S_SPAR_BTR_BON ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST = TMP.S_VWALT_KOST ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_BON = TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_BON ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_DK = TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_DK ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB = TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 = TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 = TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 = TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 = TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RM_DK = TMP.S_ZINS_RM_DK ,BBS.S_ZINS_RM_GAG = TMP.S_ZINS_RM_GAG ,BBS.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND = TMP.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND ,BBS.V_SOND_SKZ = TMP.V_SOND_SKZ ,BBS.WAEHRUNG_SKZ = TMP.WAEHRUNG_SKZ ,BBS.ZAWEIS_SKZ = TMP.ZAWEIS_SKZ WHERE BBS.MANDANT = TMP.MANDANT AND BBS.VTR_T_ID = TMP.VTR_T_ID AND BBS.WIRKSAM_ZUM = TMP.WIRKSAM_ZUM AND ( BBS.VTR_NR != TMP.VTR_NR OR BBS.AKTIV_ANSPR != TMP.AKTIV_ANSPR OR BBS.ANW_JN != TMP.ANW_JN OR BBS.BTFR_JN != TMP.BTFR_JN OR BBS.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR != TMP.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR OR BBS.CREATE_DAT != TMP.CREATE_DAT OR BBS.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM != TMP.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM OR BBS.DK_ZUF != TMP.DK_ZUF OR BBS.DR != TMP.DR OR BBS.DR_BON != TMP.DR_BON OR BBS.DR_BTFR != TMP.DR_BTFR OR BBS.DR_RIS_VN != TMP.DR_RIS_VN OR BBS.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND != TMP.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND OR BBS.DR_ZILLM != TMP.DR_ZILLM OR BBS.GAG != TMP.GAG OR BBS.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ != TMP.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ OR BBS.GEW_VW_SKZ != TMP.GEW_VW_SKZ OR BBS.KOLL_ART_SKZ != TMP.KOLL_ART_SKZ OR BBS.KOLL_VTR_NR != TMP.KOLL_VTR_NR OR BBS.LAND_SKZ != TMP.LAND_SKZ OR BBS.LFD_BTR_JN != TMP.LFD_BTR_JN OR BBS.PROD_SKZ != TMP.PROD_SKZ OR BBS.PROD_T_SKZ != TMP.PROD_T_SKZ OR BBS.RED_ZWI_DG != TMP.RED_ZWI_DG OR BBS.RED_ZWI_RFB != TMP.RED_ZWI_RFB OR BBS.STAND_ART_SKZ != TMP.STAND_ART_SKZ OR BBS.STAND_NRF_JN != TMP.STAND_NRF_JN OR BBS.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR != TMP.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR OR BBS.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR != TMP.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR OR BBS.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM != TMP.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM OR BBS.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW != TMP.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW OR BBS.S_AM_KOST != TMP.S_AM_KOST OR BBS.S_AM_KOST_DK != TMP.S_AM_KOST_DK OR BBS.S_ANS_DG != TMP.S_ANS_DG OR BBS.S_ANS_RFB != TMP.S_ANS_RFB OR BBS.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL != TMP.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL OR BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG != TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG OR BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB != TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB OR BBS.S_BON_GEW_DG != TMP.S_BON_GEW_DG OR BBS.S_BON_GEW_RFB != TMP.S_BON_GEW_RFB OR BBS.S_BRT_BTR != TMP.S_BRT_BTR OR BBS.S_BTR_UEBTR != TMP.S_BTR_UEBTR OR BBS.S_BTR_ZS != TMP.S_BTR_ZS OR BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB != TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB OR BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON != TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON OR BBS.S_E_BTR != TMP.S_E_BTR OR BBS.S_FOND_GEW_DG != TMP.S_FOND_GEW_DG OR BBS.S_FOND_GEW_RFB != TMP.S_FOND_GEW_RFB OR BBS.S_RATE_ZS != TMP.S_RATE_ZS OR BBS.S_RED_VERR_FORD != TMP.S_RED_VERR_FORD OR BBS.S_REN_ZS != TMP.S_REN_ZS OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_1 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_1 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_2 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_2 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_3 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_3 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_BON != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_BON OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON OR BBS.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB != TMP.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB OR BBS.S_SPAR_BTR != TMP.S_SPAR_BTR OR BBS.S_SPAR_BTR_BON != TMP.S_SPAR_BTR_BON OR BBS.S_VWALT_KOST != TMP.S_VWALT_KOST OR BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_BON != TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_BON OR BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_DK != TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_DK OR BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB != TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB OR BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 != TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 OR BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 != TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 OR BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 != TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 OR BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 != TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 OR BBS.S_ZINS_RM_DK != TMP.S_ZINS_RM_DK OR BBS.S_ZINS_RM_GAG != TMP.S_ZINS_RM_GAG OR BBS.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND != TMP.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND OR BBS.V_SOND_SKZ != TMP.V_SOND_SKZ OR BBS.WAEHRUNG_SKZ != TMP.WAEHRUNG_SKZ OR BBS.ZAWEIS_SKZ != TMP.ZAWEIS_SKZ ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BBS.MANDANT ,BBS.VTR_T_ID ,BBS.WIRKSAM_ZUM ,BBS.VTR_NR ,BBS.AKTIV_ANSPR ,BBS.ANW_JN ,BBS.BTFR_JN ,BBS.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR ,BBS.CREATE_DAT ,BBS.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM ,BBS.DK_ZUF ,BBS.DR ,BBS.DR_BON ,BBS.DR_BTFR ,BBS.DR_RIS_VN ,BBS.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND ,BBS.DR_ZILLM ,BBS.GAG ,BBS.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ ,BBS.GEW_VW_SKZ ,BBS.KOLL_ART_SKZ ,BBS.KOLL_VTR_NR ,BBS.LAND_SKZ ,BBS.LFD_BTR_JN ,BBS.PROD_SKZ ,BBS.PROD_T_SKZ ,BBS.RED_ZWI_DG ,BBS.RED_ZWI_RFB ,BBS.STAND_ART_SKZ ,BBS.STAND_NRF_JN ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR ,BBS.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM ,BBS.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW ,BBS.S_AM_KOST ,BBS.S_AM_KOST_DK ,BBS.S_ANS_DG ,BBS.S_ANS_RFB ,BBS.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL ,BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_BON_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_BON_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_BRT_BTR ,BBS.S_BTR_UEBTR ,BBS.S_BTR_ZS ,BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB ,BBS.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON ,BBS.S_E_BTR ,BBS.S_FOND_GEW_DG ,BBS.S_FOND_GEW_RFB ,BBS.S_RATE_ZS ,BBS.S_RED_VERR_FORD ,BBS.S_REN_ZS ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_1 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_2 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_3 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_BON ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON ,BBS.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB ,BBS.S_SPAR_BTR ,BBS.S_SPAR_BTR_BON ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_BON ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_DK ,BBS.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 ,BBS.S_ZINS_RM_DK ,BBS.S_ZINS_RM_GAG ,BBS.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND ,BBS.V_SOND_SKZ ,BBS.WAEHRUNG_SKZ ,BBS.ZAWEIS_SKZ ) VALUES ( TMP.MANDANT ,TMP.VTR_T_ID ,TMP.WIRKSAM_ZUM ,TMP.VTR_NR ,TMP.AKTIV_ANSPR ,TMP.ANW_JN ,TMP.BTFR_JN ,TMP.BWR_EUROJAHRE_ANR ,TMP.CREATE_DAT ,TMP.DK_NEG_N_ZILLM ,TMP.DK_ZUF ,TMP.DR ,TMP.DR_BON ,TMP.DR_BTFR ,TMP.DR_RIS_VN ,TMP.DR_RIS_VN_KURSAEND ,TMP.DR_ZILLM ,TMP.GAG ,TMP.GESCHL_STAT_SKZ ,TMP.GEW_VW_SKZ ,TMP.KOLL_ART_SKZ ,TMP.KOLL_VTR_NR ,TMP.LAND_SKZ ,TMP.LFD_BTR_JN ,TMP.PROD_SKZ ,TMP.PROD_T_SKZ ,TMP.RED_ZWI_DG ,TMP.RED_ZWI_RFB ,TMP.STAND_ART_SKZ ,TMP.STAND_NRF_JN ,TMP.S_ABS_KOST_E_BTR ,TMP.S_ABS_KOST_LFD_BTR ,TMP.S_ABS_KOST_O_ZILLM ,TMP.S_AKTIV_ANSPR_MRKW ,TMP.S_AM_KOST ,TMP.S_AM_KOST_DK ,TMP.S_ANS_DG ,TMP.S_ANS_RFB ,TMP.S_AUSG_AUFSCHL ,TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_DG ,TMP.S_AUSZAHL_GEW_RFB ,TMP.S_BON_GEW_DG ,TMP.S_BON_GEW_RFB ,TMP.S_BRT_BTR ,TMP.S_BTR_UEBTR ,TMP.S_BTR_ZS ,TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB ,TMP.S_DK_ZU_AB_BON ,TMP.S_E_BTR ,TMP.S_FOND_GEW_DG ,TMP.S_FOND_GEW_RFB ,TMP.S_RATE_ZS ,TMP.S_RED_VERR_FORD ,TMP.S_REN_ZS ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_1 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_2 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_3 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_BON ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_1 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_2 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_DK_3 ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_MIN_TOD ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_PFLEGE ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_TOD_BON ,TMP.S_RIS_BTR_VORAB ,TMP.S_SPAR_BTR ,TMP.S_SPAR_BTR_BON ,TMP.S_VWALT_KOST ,TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_BON ,TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_DK ,TMP.S_VWALT_KOST_VORAB ,TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_1 ,TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_2 ,TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_3 ,TMP.S_ZINS_RIS_BTR_9 ,TMP.S_ZINS_RM_DK ,TMP.S_ZINS_RM_GAG ,TMP.S_ZUW_REN_ZS_FOND ,TMP.V_SOND_SKZ ,TMP.WAEHRUNG_SKZ ,TMP.ZAWEIS_SKZ ) ;

row.pre_process: :IF &EBENE# NE "P" : STOP NOMSG, 4711, ">>> Aktivierung aufgrund der Ebene [&EBENE#] abgebrochen ..." :ENDIF :INC JOBI.SQL_BBS2_PARAM
